quote: I think it is the fact that birds are two-legged, like us, which gives them something of our balance and gesture and makes them nearer to us.

The downright fanatic is nearer to the heart of things than the cool and slippery disputant.

Nothing is farther than earth from heaven; nothing is nearer than heaven to earth.

Nearer the gods no mortal may approach.

Of old they spoke the languages of Men, after their own fashion, and liked and disliked much the same things as Men did. But what exactly our relationship is can no longer be discovered.

If I had my will I would live in a ship on the sea, and never come nearer to humanity than that!
